item.title: Learning Ruby - First Impressions
item.description: Chef is used in my place of work, and so as a result I started learning Ruby programming language. I know some python (enough to get me by) but thought that knowing some Ruby would be a good development in my learning. This is an attempt an my first impressions of what is good for a beginner and what is not so good (from the perspective of someone coming from Python).
